name: Showzey
tag_list: photos, facebook, picasa, gmail, yahoo, collect, liberate, collect-photos, liberate-photos, photos-from-gmail
overview:
Showzey is a web service that enables you to take control of your online photos. Showzey will collect all your photos along shared photos from Gmail mailboxes, Flickr, Picasa, Facebeook, etc. With Showzey you can see all your online photos on one page, you can search photos, share photos, transfer photos between sites, create albums spanning multiple services, create RSS feeds, and much more.

There is no signups or registration just go to the website and add your different image service giving Showzey permission to find your photos. Showzey then indexes all your images from all your services so you can search and filter your photos to find the ones want. You can then add the photo to one of your other service, download it, add it to a photo set, add captions or comments that are shared with your Showzey friends.

If you are seeking to get all your images in one place and have the ability to copy photos from one service to another without downloading from one and then uploading to the other Showzey is for you. Give it a try it’s a free service.

Web site: http://www.showzey.com

Blog: http://blog.showzey.com

Twitter: http://twitter.com/showzey

Facebook: http://tinyurl.com/fbshowzey

Feedback: http://showzey.uservoice.com
